title: Hunted
description: Hunted and on the run.A decision to make.…one that will tear Maddie’s heart out.Just when Maddie thinks she has reached safety at her uncle’s farm, a new threat emerges sending her on the run in a race for her life.Forced to flee the farm, she and her group must find a way to escape those chasing them. Hunted by government officials, with danger at every turn, Maddie is forced to make a heart wrenching decision to protect the ones she loves.Will she make the right choice?With their mother’s fate still unknown, Maddie and her brother, Zach, are more determined than ever to reach their cabin deep in the Missouri Ozarks.Can they evade capture to be reunited with their mother?You will love Hunted, the second pulse-pounding post-apocalyptic thriller in the Days of Want Series, because everyone wants to know they can survive.Get it Now!OTHER BOOKS BY TL PAYNEDays of Want SeriesTurbulentHuntedTurmoilUprisingUpheavalMayhemGateway to Chaos SeriesSeeking SafetySeeking RefugeSeeking JusticeSeeking HopeLook for the Fall of Houston Series coming November 30, 2020.
